record.title: MORNING BUSINESS
record.chair: Under the previous order, there will now be a period of morning business for 60 minutes, with Senators permitted to speak therein for up to 10 minutes each, with the time equally divided and controlled between the two leaders or their designees, with the first half of the time under the control of the Republicans and the second half of the time under the control of the majority.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I believe I have been yielded 15 minutes of the next half hour.
